segments.text: I want to get a snack at the cafeteria .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to buy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I may just get some chips .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm probably going to buy something too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you want to get ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want some sort of candy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to get a Snickers or a Kit Kat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think they sell Kit Kats .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll just get a Snickers then .
segments.speaker: S2
